page.title: 02STRUCTURE DOWNDERRY/SEATON
page.content: The major settlement is a lineal development of 1.5 kilometres on the coastal strip,recently{1960+}extending inland up 3 valleys and 4 hillsides. There are about 465 dwellings,mostly owner occupied plus local authority housing,old peoples homes and a small amount of private lets. Buildings housing services and amenities are discussed elsewhere. In Seaton which fronts an extensive bathing beach the chalet camp and village,overwhelms the residential development in number and acreage.The holiday development provides amusement arcade,tennis courts and childrens playground. In both villages basic services eg Post Offices,Public Toilets,Public Telephones,Public seats are provided. There is very little open space apart from the foreshore public access.
